works.description:
Original articles about the favelas of  
Brazil (the author - Igor Vladimirovich Volkov, Head of the Project  
RUSSOBRAS) as well as photos taken by the author, and Alexander Leal  
(Brazil)in the favelas of Rio de Janeiro especially for the project.

Note: We have already appealed to the administration of the Blogger on
this  
matter on 28 of June (number of ticket 826576020), but received simply the
 
standard runaround and no action.
In all cases, thank you.
